game.name: Cave Explorer
game.shortDescription: Cave Explorer: Become a gem hunter exploring ancient caves. Find the sapphire, but watch out for hostile locals and treacherous fire. Can you reach the final level? Embark on this thrilling underground adventure now!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cave Explorer: Become a gem hunter exploring ancient caves. Find the sapphire, but watch out for hostile locals and treacherous fire. Can you reach the final level? Embark on this thrilling underground adventure now!
